divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my bedroom window NNE and I saw this light come across the sky, thinking it was a meteor, but it stopped. From the bottom a smaller one dropped a little below the larger one. then stopped, where apone the larger one took off at a tremendous speed from which it came and the smaller one took off in the opposit direction. I was in my bedroom and just looking at the sky I couldn't beleve what I saw I didn't tell anyone because I was just a kid and they think I was crazy. This all happened in the fall of 1954 on a clear crisp night
Summary: White light that looked like a meteor at first, however it stopped and a smaller object dropped from the bottom
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 30th 1954
